name: God Bless The Maggot Machine
description:
Hello... I made this in a week, it is my submission for the Big Game Festive Jam 2022! https://itch.io/jam/big-festive-game-jam-2022

This is my first time really making a game or participating in a gamejam. So the fact that I made anything is a positive. Thx for playing.

Controls:
Spacebar & mouse

Credits:
Art/Programming/Drooling - Greg Tales
Music - Kieran Baskerville

Free Assets I Used:

Font: Troika by Joël Carrouché - https://www.dafont.com/joel-carrouche.d5514

Audio: Baby Cry by ??? - https://freesound.org/people/deleted_user_2104797/sounds/346663/

Audio: Dying Gasps by AmeAngelofSin - https://freesound.org/people/AmeAngelofSin/sounds/326890/
